text: @tedcruz You appeased, supported and even promoted inaction while US citizens were dying, You refused to confront the ignorant, self-absorbed ass in @whitehouse ... so did Newt. Screw you and your "concern" #COVID19 #coronavirus  #TrumpPlague Your "god" supposedly has long memory
